Name: Vida
Review Text: This place is nice and food is so so (depending on what you order), but for being a tapas restaurant it‚Äôs overly expensive. Tapas are small bites but in Spain tapas are bigger. Octopus was supposed to be a la gallega with  potatoes and ‚Ä¶

Name: Vida
Review Text: If you like to share small dishes and high quality food, with a nice drink, this is a must. Ambient is quite relaxed and cozy. Service normally is very good and the selection of tapas is always satisfying.  Approved by quiquinn Stars.

Name: Vida
Review Text: Friendly and attentive staff. Take at least 3 options from menu when ordering. Good selection of wines. Loved the interior design.

Name: Vida
Review Text: Nice and cool place! brew their own IPA, but had none when I was there :-(

Name: Vida
Review Text: The food was tasty and the restaurant had a nice atmosphere, however I felt the portions were very small for the price, compared to other tapas restaurants I have been to in Amsterdam.  The service was also slow and there didn't seem to be enough staff.  Having said that, the quality of the food and drink was good.

Name: Vida
Review Text: Lovely location, well made and presented food. Tasted really good, but unfortunately the service could not deliver adequately what was well crafted in the kitchen. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vida
Review Text: The food here is delicious. This goes for all the 7 dishes we ordered. Loved the lamb cotteletes. What was annoying is that they were "out of" the main dishes that you expect at a tapas place (such as patatas bravas) and the main beer they ‚Ä¶

Name: Vida
Review Text: Amazing staff. Anthousa was the most amazing. Customer service was outstanding and so welcoming. Prices are reasonable. Food was also excellent. We had several tapas, but the Vinson, lamb, salmon, beets, and croquettes. Enjoyable experience through and through. Cozy but upbeat.

Name: Vida
Review Text: Modern interieur with Some spanish influence, service was friendly, however everything was very slow. Drinks specially the wine took very very long to come to the table. Food also. Thats why we skipped the last tapas with wine because we ‚Ä¶

Name: Vida
Review Text:
Food is excellent however a bit pricy  drinks are extraordinary over priced.
Main reason for less then OK rating is bad service. All people working here "work in a restaurant" and aren't "restaurant personell". Working hard but ‚Ä¶

Name: Vida
Review Text: Hey guys, we just had some tapas and beer at this restaurant. The service was really nice and even searched for an english translation of their menu for us. They also checked if everything is fine with us frequently. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vida
Review Text: Excellent food quality with a wide variety of worthwhile options to choose from. Some typical Spanish, others more "Mediterranean". Service was friendly and helpful (and honest) when deciding over additional plates to order.

Name: Vida
Review Text: I ordered ham, 2 tapas and a main. All of them were delicious. Nice ambiance, reasonable prices, good music in the background. I'll definitely visit again.

Name: Vida
Review Text: Reasonable food, but service is extremely slow. I ordered 5 tapas and it took 40 min between the first dish and the last. By the time the last dish came I was not hungry anymore. I was used to the concept that all tapas come more or less at the same time, that's why the dishes are rather small

Name: Vida
Review Text: Nice meal, nice place, nice staff. Recommended!

Name: Vida
Review Text: Food was actually pretty good. Except for the patatas bravas. They should be a no-brainer. Seating is nice as well. But the service was not good at all. Fake smiles accompanied by snobby looks. Would not come again.

Name: Vida
Review Text: Absolutely delicious food. Well prepared, well priced and good portions. The staff is polite friendly and efficient!

Name: Vida
Review Text: Food was great and Amber was wonderful.  Tot ziens!  Updating this review as we eat here ever year when we visit family in Netherlands.  Always great food and wonderful staff.

Name: Vida
Review Text: This place is nice and cozy. Great selection of tapas and decent wine selection! Loved the garlic shrimp

Name: Vida
Review Text: Fantastic Spanish Tapas.  Some of the best in amsterdam.  Service was perfect and the outdoor terrace great.  We will be back again and again!
